commenter_a: You'll fit in with the self-important Hollyweird glitterati JKR. The British have never been enamoured of their paid entertainers except for simply that, as entertainers, who are well paid for their craft. The disenchanted and disenfranchised led the way with Brexit. Believe me, those who formed this majority are not racist not are they Ill educated.
